string.name: play
string.translation_description: Action text for button to play a game

string.name: level
string.translation_description: Label shown under the user's current level

string.name: workshops
string.translation_description: Label shown above the list of the user's workshops. A workshop is where the user's elf character delivers presents.

string.name: unlock_at_level
string.translation_description: Label placed over something to be unlocked later. Ex: Unlock at level 5.

string.name: present_dropped
string.translation_description: Message displayed when a new present is available on the map

resources.string: Ông già Noel đã thả một món quà!

string.name: present_too_far
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user tries to click a present that's too far away

string.name: workshop_too_far
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user tries to click a workshop that's too far away

string.name: no_presents_collected
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user tries to click a workshop but they have not yet collected any presents

resources.string: Thu thập một vài món quà trước tiên!

string.name: bag_is_full
string.translation_description: Message displayed when user tries to collect presents but their bag is full

string.name: workshop_moved
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user successfully changes the location of their workshop on the map.

string.name: move_canceled
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user cancels a workshop move

string.name: workshop_move_too_soon
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user tries to move a workshop they have already moved today

resources.string: Đã di chuyển xưởng này hôm nay. Hãy thử lại vào ngày mai

string.name: go_here
string.translation_description: Label displayed on a map marker to direct the user to a specific location. This should be an imperative statement, and should be translated as 'Go there' not 'Come here' in languages where this is significant.

string.name: perm_location_rationale
string.translation_description: Rationale shown to users to explain why Present Quest needs location permissions

resources.string: Săn tìm quà tặng cần quyền truy cập vị trí của bạn để giúp bạn tìm được món quà của ông già Noel.

string.name: perm_required
string.translation_description: Title of a dialog shown to users when they have rejected a required permission

string.name: perm_go_to_settings
string.translation_description: Content of a dialog asking the user to go to the Settings screen and enable the Location permission

resources.string: Săn tìm quà tặng sẽ không hoạt động khi chưa có quyền truy cập vị trí của bạn. Vui lòng cho phép truy cập Vị trí trong Cài đặt.

string.name: required_permissions_missing
string.translation_description: Message shown to user if they reject all attempts to enable the Location permission

string.name: next
string.translation_description: Button text to advance through tutorial

string.name: onboarding_msg_1
string.translation_description: Tutorial message explaining why there are presents on the map. Two lines.

resources.string: Quà tặng đang rơi ra\nkhỏi xe trượt tuyết của ông già Noel!

string.name: onboarding_msg_2
string.translation_description: Tutorial message explaining how to collect a present. Two lines.

resources.string: Đi bộ tới các điểm quà tặng trong\nđời thực để lấy quà.

string.name: onboarding_msg_3
string.translation_description: Tutorial message explaining how to bring presents to workshop. Two lines.

resources.string: Khi túi của bạn đã đầy,\nhãy đi tới xưởng để dỡ quà

string.name: onboarding_msg_4
string.translation_description: Final tutorial message, the player is about to begin the game.

string.name: msg_present_nearby
string.translation_description: Message displayed when there is a nearby present.

resources.string: Có một món quà gần đây!

string.name: msg_bag_almost_full
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user's bag of presents collected in the game is almost full.

resources.string: Túi của bạn sắp đầy rồi!

string.name: msg_unload_bag
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user needs to go to a workshop.

resources.string: Dỡ túi của bạn tại xưởng.

string.name: msg_unlocked_workshop
string.translation_description: Message displayed when the user gains an additional workshop available for use.

resources.string: Bạn đã mở khóa một xưởng mới!

string.name: msg_click_present
string.translation_description: Message displayed to tell the user to click a present to attempt to put it in their bag.

resources.string: Nhấp vào món quà để nhặt quà.

string.name: msg_click_workshop
string.translation_description: Message displayed to tell the user to click a workshop to use it.

resources.string: Nhấp vào xưởng của bạn để dỡ quà.

string.name: level_denominator
string.translation_description: Second half of a label showing the users level. For example, could be presented as 1 of 12 or 5 of 12.

string.name: full
string.translation_description: Label displayed under the user's bag fullness. Preceded by a percentage, so it reads as X percent FULL.
